content: Hello Mister Heine, thanks for inviting me to see the apartment. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: James Smith

content: Hello, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. I would be happy to discuss the rental price with you.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
Can we negotiate? I would like to rent the apartment for the lowest price possible.

Mister Heine: Yes, of course. We can certainly negotiate. What is your budget for the rental price?
name: James Smith

content: My budget for the rental price is 500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I see. Based on the size and location of the apartment, I would like to propose a rental price of 600 Euros per month. Is that within your budget?
name: James Smith

content: A rental price of 600 Euros per month is outside of my budget. I would be looking for a rental price closer to 500 Euros per month.
name: Heinrich Heine
